name: Toy Robot: The Room Defender
description:
This is my submission to the Ludum Dare 37 Game Jam.

Simple FPS, you need to kill all the cockroaches invading The Room in 2 minutes. Try to kill them ALL and beat others scores.

Ludum Dare Link: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=p...

Change LOG :

V1.15.12.16 :

  • Bug Fixed : Lock cursor in the center of the screen.
